page.title: 10DITTON PRIORS PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: The school was built in{1876}it consisted of two medium sized brick classrooms.In{1967}a further classroom and kitchen were established and in{ {1970}an additional toilet block was built.There is an adequate ash felt playground netball pitch.In{1982}the school was fortunate enough to have usage of a playing field for sports use.At present there are{67}pupils in the school with{3}teachers, a cook, and{3}other staff. Also in{1982}the school was modified even further when we had new classroom furniture and electric heaters installed plus a library and computer area. Most pupils stay for school dinners the cook makes approximatly {65}dinners for{25}Upper Juniors,{21} Lower juniors, and{21}Infants.
